content: Golden Glowing Eye is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Glowing_Eye.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Glowing Eye'.
The content is as follows:
Golden Glowing Eye is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
